course_description: This course will apply the basics of biochemistry and physics to anesthesia practice. A review of basic organic chemistry pertaining to metabolic pathways, structure and function of proteins, cellular mechanisms for action and drug receptor interaction, and enzyme kinetics.
schedule_location: T 1:30pm-4:20pm in Nursing Learning Ctr, Rm 210
sections: Class Nbr: 5313, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 1:30-4:20p, Instructor: R. Branch, Status: Open
